summary.event: ACM / IEEE 28th International Conference on Model Driven Engineering Languages and Systems (MODELS)

workshops.dates: Thu 3 Jul 2025 - Submissions Deadline, Thu 31 Jul 2025 - Notification of Authors, Thu 7 Aug 2025 - Camera-ready Deadline

summary.description: MODELS 2025, including the workshops, will be organized as a hybrid event with in-person and virtual participation. Presenters of accepted papers may present their work virtually.

workshops.title: International Workshop on Collaborative and Participatory Modeling (CoPaMo 2025)
workshops.description: Collaborative modeling is a key enabler to engineering complex systems.

workshops.title: 2nd International Workshop on Sustainability and Modeling (SusMod’25)
workshops.description: Sustainability is becoming a key characteristic of modern systems.

workshops.title: MDE Intelligence: 7th Workshop on Artificial Intelligence and Model-driven Engineering
workshops.description: AI has become part of everyone’s life and impacts the system and software development lifecycle.

workshops.title: Modeling Language Engineering (MLE)
workshops.description: Modeling is a key paradigm to successfully engineer software intensive systems.

workshops.title: MULTI 2025
workshops.description: The MULTI workshop series is the premier venue for researchers and practitioners working on multi-level modeling.

workshops.title: Models and Evolution 2025 (ME 2025)
workshops.description: The workshop will discuss the latest developments around the topic of the evolution of models.

workshops.title: Second International Workshop on Model Management (MoM)
workshops.description: The goal is to improve the state of the art in Model Management (MoM).

workshops.title: LowCode 2025: Low-Code Development Platforms
workshops.description: The workshop explores opportunities for technology and experience transfer between low-code and model-driven engineering communities.

workshops.title: MoDeVVa’25: Model Driven Engineering, Verification and Validation
workshops.description: Discussion on verification and validation (V&V) in Model-Based Systems Engineering and Model Driven software Engineering.

workshops.title: onto:Nexus Ontological Modeling and Analysis Workshop
workshops.description: Focus on ontological modeling and analysis in model-based software and systems engineering.

workshops.title: MoDIoT – 1st International Workshop on Model-Based Development for the IoT
workshops.description: Discussion on model-based development in addressing the challenges of IoT.
